stentry.p: © INVIDI Technologies Corporation. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.

All items marked with the or symbols, or the symbol are trademarks and/or service marks of INVIDI Technologies Corporation (“INVIDI”). All other marks, names, and logos mentioned in this document are the property of their respective owners.

***PROPRIETARY AND CONFIDENTIAL INFORMATION OF INVIDI*** This document and the information conveyed by it (collectively, “Information”) are governed by the non-disclosure agreement signed by both INVIDI and anyone who uses or accesses any Information (the "USER"). If INVIDI and USER have not signed any non disclosure agreement, then USER agrees as follows by using or accessing any Information:

This document contains proprietary and confidential Information of INVIDI and INVIDI’s advertising system software commercially known as ADVATAR. No Information contained herein shall be used or disclosed for any purpose whatsoever other than the exclusive purpose(s) for which INVIDI has previously approved in writing, and under no circumstances shall any Information be subjected to any use or any disclosure that does not benefit INVIDI directly. Upon INVIDI's request, all Information (and any copies) shall be either returned to INVIDI or destroyed, all in accordance with INVIDI's reasonable instructions, and USER shall certify in writing to INVIDI that all Information (including copies thereof) has been returned or completely destroyed.

INVIDI owns all right, title, and interest in ADVATAR. INVIDI may have patents or pending patent applications, trademarks, service marks, copyrights, or other intellectual property rights covering ADVATAR and the subject matter in this document. The furnishing of this document does not give anyone any license to these patents, patent applications, trademarks, service marks, copyrights, or other intellectual property, except as expressly stated in a written license agreement between INVIDI and USER that has been accepted by INVIDI separately from this document.

***CAUTION*** Please be advised that INVIDI will change both the ADVATAR system and this document from time to time. Any such changes to the ADVATAR system may render some or all of the Information conveyed by this document inaccurate, incomplete, or misleading. Therefore, USER shall exercise care in accounting for changes to the ADVATAR system and/or to its elements before reliance is placed on the Information conveyed by this document. Unless otherwise provided in another agreement between INVIDI and USER that has been accepted by INVIDI, THIS DOCUMENT DOES NOT MAKE ANY EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTY, GUARANTY, OR REPRESENTATION OF ANY KIND.
